settings.kit_url: (If selected) URL to your Font Awesome kit
settings.kit_url_help: Ensure your kit is set to 'Web Font', then paste the URL to it below.

test.heading: Icon tests
test.desc: Below are some tests you can use to check if icons are working correctly. You may need to refresh the page if you have changed any settings. If you see a square/rectangle instead of an icon, it means this set isn't working correctly.
